text: atah allaah ke maarg mein yuddh karo - tumapar to bas tumhaaree apanee hee zimmedaaree hai - aur eemaanavaalon kee kamazoriyo ko door karo aur unhen (yuddh ke lie) ubhaaro. isakee bahut sambhaavana hai ki allaah inakaar karanevaalon ke zor ko rok laga de. allaah bada zoravaala aur kathor dand denevaala hai
